metadata_description: The name or title of the contract owner within the corporation.
The legal entity name of the counterparty as stated in the contract.
The full address for counterparty notice contact, including street, city, state/province, and country if available.
The email address for counterparty notice contact.
The full name of the counterparty notice contact person.
Counterparty number (e.g., SAP vendor number). Provide as a string.
Does the corporation have the option to extend the contract? Return "Yes", "No", or "" if not specified.
The effective date of the contract in YYYY-MM-DD format if available.
Estimated contract value in agreement currency. Provide as a string, numbers only, no currency symbols.
Estimated contract value in USD. Provide as a string, numbers only, no currency symbols.
The exchange rate to USD as stated in the contract. Provide as a string.
The expiry date of the contract in YYYY-MM-DD format if available.
The functional unit or department responsible for the contract.
Is there a change of control clause? Return "Yes", "No", or "" if not specified.
Is there a non-solicitation or non_competition agreement? Return "Yes", "No", or "" if not specified.
Is there a corporate guarantee? Return "Yes", "No", or "" if not specified.
Is there a corporate indemnity of a third party? Return "Yes", "No", or "" if not specified.
Is there a termination for convenience clause? Return "Yes", "No", or "" if not specified.
Is there a volume rebate? Return "Yes", "No", or "" if not specified.
Is this contract a lease? Return "Yes", "No", or "" if not specified.
Is this a material contract? Return "Yes", "No", or "" if not specified.
Is this an evergreen agreement? Return "Yes", "No", or "" if not specified.
The legal entity name of the corporation as stated in the contract.
The site location of the corporation as stated in the contract.
The payment terms as stated in the contract (e.g., "Net 30 days").
The project number associated with the contract, if available.
The renewal notice period as stated in the contract (e.g., "60 days").
The SAP outline agreement number, if available.
Third party assignment with/without consent; mutual/one-way (e.g., sale of asset). If not specified, return "".

filename of the master agreement the amendment is amending
the effective date of the amendment document, not the master agreement (if available )
the expiry date of the amendment document, not the master agreement (if available )
the amendment renewal notice period in days (if available )
amendment contract value (if available)
if the document amends the original payment term of the master agreement, this is the new payment term
some master agreements have multiple amendments. this is the number pertaining to the order (for example, if there are 5 amendments, and this document is the 3rd, then the amendment number is 3)
how is the counterparty described in the main agreement?
what is being amended from the master agreement (expiry date, payment term, rates, clauses, etc.)
